<u>1856 <\u>
The Government School of Mines 
Jermyn St. July 9th 1856.
Mr Huxleys Report 
on
Dr Carpenters Paper 
I can have no hesitation in 
recommending the publication of the 
second part of Dr Carpenters 
Researches on the Foraminifera 
in the Philosophical Transactions.
Those only who have been wearied 
by the fruitless attempt to form 
any clear conception of the 
structure of the foraminifera from 
the ordinary works on the subject 
can estimate at their proper 
value Dr. Carpenters clear and
